relevant_findings.general: No acute distress, resting comfortably in bed
relevant_findings.heent: Mucous membranes moist, pupils equal, round, reactive to light
relevant_findings.cardiovascular: Regular rate and rhythm, normal S1/S2, no murmurs, rubs, or gallops
relevant_findings.respiratory: Clear to auscultation bilaterally, no wheezes, rales, or rhonchi
relevant_findings.abdominal: Soft, mild appropriate tenderness to palpation over incisions, non-distended, positive bowel sounds, no rebound or guarding
relevant_findings.wound: Abdominal laparoscopic incisions clean, dry, intact
relevant_findings.extremities: Warm, well-perfused, no cyanosis, clubbing, or edema
relevant_findings.neurological: Alert and oriented to person, place, and time, cranial nerves II-XII grossly intact
